description: test/run: ignore all but .go file during compiledir action

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=0e114e4df4ec ***

test/run: ignore all but .go file during compiledir action

R=golang-dev, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6454091

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

I had problem with .orig files, like this:

# go run run.go                                                             
compiledir fixedbugs/bug396.go : exit status 1                                       
/home/alex/go/root/test/fixedbugs/bug396.dir/one.go.orig:5: package statement must be first                                                                                    
/home/alex/go/root/test/fixedbugs/bug396.dir/one.go.orig:5: non-declaration statement outside function body                                                                    
/home/alex/go/root/test/fixedbugs/bug396.dir/one.go.orig:5: syntax error: unexpected name, expecting semicolon or newline                                                      
go tool 8g: exit status 1                                                            
                                                                                     
exit status 1

subject: code review 6454091: test/run: ignore all but .go file during compiledir action
